author: aching
msg: GIRAPH-163: bin/giraph script overwrites CLASSPATH if "dev
environment" detected (this also removes USER_JAR from CLASSPATH)

author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Markus M. May "Minor Refactoring in CategoryWorker - use delegator instead of request in getRelatedCategoriesRet" https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-4738
The method getRelatedCategoriesRet uses the request, the final called method could be called using the delegator directly easily. I have refactored the method accordingly.

author: jleroux
msg: Add ${errMessage} to CommonDatabaseProblem label, it was missing there

author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Paul Pipper "Categories - calculated trails" https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-4580
I noticed that currently OFBiz misses a simple function to generate a category trail.
Generating a trail, however, is often useful when generating breadcrums, facetted search results, and proper category trees in general.

author: todd
msg: HDFS-3071. haadmin failover command does not provide enough detail when target NN is not ready to be active. Contributed by Todd Lipcon.
